Actually "Звёздочкина" ends with "ина". The name "Звёздочкин" is similar but without "а". The heading contains "Звёздочкина" (professor Zvezdochkina). This includes the substring "Звёздочкин" inside? The string "Звёздочкина": З в ё з д о ч к и н а. The substring "Звёздочкин" is first 10 letters without trailing 'а'. So "Звёздочкина" contains "Звёздочкин" as prefix. So yes, the name appears as part of the longer word. The task: find first occurrence of name "ЗВЁЗДОЧКИН" (case-insensitive). Should return snippet with a few words before and after. In heading we have: "Как Знайка победил профессора Звёздочкина". Provide snippet maybe the whole heading.
